name: Batata
tagline: The Java library for your potato needs.
body:
## A free library for your potato needs
Tired of writing your own potato code? We have a solution for you: introducing the all new Batataâ„¢ library.

### How to use?
Just use our Batata constructor, `public Batata(float weight, int sweetness)`, to get your own Batata:

`Batata b = new Batata(0.3, 7);`

### Documentation
The Batata source code is documented using the Javadoc standard.

### Any questions?
If you have any questions or suggestions, you can send an email to [batata@joaopluis.pt](mailto:batata@joaopluis.pt).
